my first blog post

Oct 15, 2015

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.

Check out the [Jekyll docs][jekyll] for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at [Jekyll’s GitHub repo][jekyll-gh]. If you have questions, you can ask them on [Jekyll’s dedicated Help repository][jekyll-help].

Marcus Osterberg

Hi, I’m the co-founder and CTO of GONUTRI. I’ve spent most part of my adult years traveling and working as an IT-consult. Born and raised in a small Swedish town, live now days in Munich.

this.blog is the home of my insights as a developer. Here I share my experience from the path of becoming a better developer.

please contact me on twitter |
